publ: by Office of Financial Aid at Stockton University
name: FinancialAidVirtualAssistant
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Make the financial aid process a lot less stressful with the Financial Aid Virtual Assistant. Simply enable the skill and ask: "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" The Financial Aid Virtual Assistant will keep you up-to-date with helpful tips, deadline reminders, and more that will assist you throughout the year to maximize all financial aid opportunities. Proudly created by the Office of Financial Aid at Stockton University to serve all student, parents, and counselors!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
